snippet: A state oversight panel focuses on a crucial issue in the rollout of educational standards.
abstract: Editorial calls on New York State Legislature and Gov Andrew Cuomo to provide funds to shore up new Common Core learning standards that have been met with resistance and confusion by some districts and teachers; holds essential step will be to end conference-based training sessions for teachers in favor of continuous instruction by master educators who observe teachers and give feedback.
lead_paragraph: A state oversight panel focuses on a crucial issue in the rollout of educational standards.

headline.main: Preparing Teachers for the Common Core
headline.print_headline: Preparing Teachers for the Common Core
